rules_text:
Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
If a nontoken creature you control would die this turn, cache it instead. [i](Exile it and create a Memory enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: You may play the cached card this turn.”)[/i]
notes:
!tokens Memory EIW
type B

The daemons knew the Weft was failing for a long time before anyone listened.
